TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. It's closed immediatly.

I wish I wasn't responsible for closing house of madness.

Granted, its everyones fault.

I wish someone will make the next house of madness or I will be forced to make it and will make a mess of it.

Granted. It's closed immediatly.

I wish I wasn't responsible for closing house of madness.

Granted. I AM.

I wish a mod would give us authorization to restart the house of madness.

Granted, Why do we need a mod? Can't we just make a new house of madness?

I wish we would stop wishing and make the new house of madness.

grnated it is crap

i wish for CHEESE

Granted, it's the moldy cheese I found in the back of my fridge this morning after I went looking for it to sate my craving for cheese... such a disappointment

I wish that the new House of Madness thread is NOT affiliated with me this time xD And that it moves slower

Granted, but you are responsible for moderating it

I wish someone would order me a pizza

Granted, its my idea of a pizza.

I wish that chobit would be affiliated with the new house of madness thread and that it moves faster.

Granted. It's closed at 3:00pm tomarrow

I wish that i could rename the madness thread.

Not granted! As your Gott-Kaiserin I hereby sentence you to exile! .....IN THE INTERNATIONAL FORUM

I wish for Kasper's address and the phonenumber of the nearest pizza shop

Granted, its the worst pizza shop in the world.

I wish that chobit would come online more often.

Granted, what little progress on PfL I've been making has now been reduced to a fraction

I wish people would stop ogling me!!! >.< What am I? A KSP supermodel?!

Granted, your a KSP superstar.

I wish for chobit to kill me already so I stop having to wait.

Granted. It's Veeeeeeeeeery long and excrutiating.

I wish for Dubstep.

Edited May 22, 2013 by Rage097

Granted. She kills you with a slow, painful death.

I wish Chobit randomly ended up lock in my basement together with a slightly mad chipmunk.

Granted, the next morning you open the basement door and I'm standing there with a torn-apart chipmunk clenched in my teeth and covered in it's blood *growl*

I wish people would be snipped less often on this thread

Granted, only you are sniped on every thread.

I wish I could live in the forums

granted you canted go back to your own house

i wish for the ability to cros planets

Granted! Unfortunately, this involves being slammed on the surface, and then excruciatingly squeezed through.

I wish for dinosaur omelette.

granted it costs you billions

i wish for more cats

Granted, they overran you and suffocate you.

I wish for the next update to come out.

Granted, but it already has.

I wish that I had a Tupolev Tu-144.

Edited May 22, 2013 by (An Original Name)

Granted. Have you heard what happened to one of them in Paris? Well, you were in it.

I wish 0.20 could download faster!!!

Granted. But it gets corrupted in the process, resulting in horrible game-breaking bugs that force you to redownload it. Except everyone else downloading it too just crashed the store, and Steam had an emergency maint.

I wish this thunderstorm could actually do something instead of sitting around flashing.

Granted, it drops 1 (mega)ton worth of rain, and then it promptly leaves.

I wish that the .20 update had included a resource system, without making the development time for .20 even longer.
